altTitles.ja: ダーウィンズゲーム

altTitles.th: ดาร์วินส์ เกม

description.en:
High school student Kaname Sudou receives an invitation from a classmate to play Darwin’s Game, a mobile game he has never heard of. However, as soon as he opens the application, a green snake suddenly pops out from his phone screen and bites his neck, leaving him unconscious. Waking up in the infirmary without any signs of a snake bite, he is told by the school to take the rest of the day off. Although he is puzzled by what has happened, he dismisses the surreal experience as a hallucination and boards the train home.  
Unfortunately, his curiosity gets the better of him and he uses the application once again. As the application appears to be just like any other battle game, Kaname breathes out a sigh of relief and decides to start his first match. However, the pleasant surprise is short-lived, as his in-game opponent unexpectedly appears right in front of him and attempts to hunt him down with a knife.  
As he desperately runs for his life, Kaname puts two and two together and realizes that Darwin’s Game is not an ordinary game, but rather, it’s a brutal fight for survival.

title.en: Non Non Biyori Vacation - Nyanpasu Picture Diary

altTitles.ja: 劇場版 のんのんびより ばけーしょん にゃんぱす絵日記帳

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: The Film Emperor Is Dead Set on Becoming My Backer

description.en: A gold mentalist paparazzi exposes pictures of Lin Chu privately meeting with his sponsor late at night. After getting into a car accident, he entered the body of the center of gossip, Lin Chu. And, his mysterious sponsor is suspected to be the cold and ruthless movie star Li Yu, who doesn't seem to get along with Lin Chu?! What's even more shocking is that it seems Lin Chu... Has more than one sponsor?!

altTitles.ja: オタク否定ギャル

title.en: Kimi ga Hoeru Tame no Uta wo,

altTitles.ja: キミが吠えるための歌を、
キミ吠え

description.en: Oogami Haru, a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group… A shared story of music and youth between two girls, each burdened by the past.
description.ja: 幼い見た目とチグハグな低い声に悩む女子高生・大神晴は、ひそかに「歌ってみた」動画をあげる日々を送っていたが、クラスメイトの鳴宮優雨に歌声を聞かれてしまう。「馬鹿にされる…」と怯える晴だったが、優雨は「私とユニットを組んでプロを目指そう」と誘ってきて… 。くするぶる想いを抱える少女二人の、音楽青春ストーリー！

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

altTitles.ja: 医員、蘇る

altTitles.vi: Bác Sĩ Trùng Sinh Về Murim

description.en:
A medical mission turns fatal as Dr. Jin’s life slips away. Miraculously, he wakes on a battlefield. Instinct takes over. He tends to patients before realizing that this is the martial arts world of The Reigning Heavenly Demon! He’s reincarnated as a child with mastery of modern medicine and soon his skills draw notice. From the renowned White-scaled Doctor to the infamous Gongson Family, everyone sees his potential. But how much is Dr. Jin willing to sacrifice before risking death again?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%82%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%9E/458?tab=episode)
description.fr:
J'étais à l'étranger pour faire du bénévolat médical, lorsque la guerre civile a éclaté. J'ai été tué par un soldat rebelle, alors que je prenais une balle pour un patient. Mais quand je me suis finalement réveillé, j'étais devenu un enfant!  
  
Et devant moi se tenait une charrette détruite et un groupe de personnes bizarrement vêtues, qui étaient inconscientes!  
  
"C'est exactement comme un monde de Murim."  
  
Alors que je m'empresse de prodiguer les premiers soins pour tenter de sauver ne serait-ce qu'une personne, je réalise que ce monde est celui du [Roi Démon Suprême], un roman de Murim que j'ai pris plaisir à lire.  
  
Après avoir rencontré l'équipe de secours des "Trois Grands Docteurs", j'ai découvert qu'une des personnes que j'ai sauvées était le protagoniste de ce roman, le futur Roi Démon "Yeoharyun"!

"Hé, puisque je te suis redevable de m'avoir sauvé, appelle-moi "hyung"."

Pour lui avoir sauvé la vie, je suis devenu frère de sang du futur Roi Démon, et Baekrineuison, l'une des personnes les mieux informées, a reconnu mon potentiel et m'a pris comme disciple. C'est ainsi que je suis devenu le plus grand médecin de Gangho!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
description.ja:
海外医療奉仕先で内戦に巻き込まれ、患者を庇い、反乱軍の銃に撃たれたはずが、目を覚ますと子供の姿になっていた！？ 目の前には壊れた馬車と不思議な服装を着て倒れている人々！ ”まるで武侠の世界のようだ” １人でも救おうと応急処置をしていたところ、ここが日頃からよく読んでいた武侠小説「至尊天魔」の中の世界だということに気づく。 そこで「天下三大医員」の白鱗医仙に出会うが…

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
description.ko:
[독점연재]

해외 의료 봉사를 갔다가 내전에 휘말렸다.
환자 대신 반군의 총을 맞고 간신히 눈을 떴는데
아니, 어린아이가 됐잖아?!?

눈앞에 있는 건 부서진 마차와 특이한 복식의 쓰러진 사람들!

"꼭 무림 세계 같네."

한 명이라도 살리기 위해 응급처치를 하던 중,
이곳이 즐겨 읽던 무협 소설,
[지존천마] 속 세상이라는 것을 알게 되고.

'천하삼대의원' 백린의선을 비롯한 구조대를 만나
내가 구한 이들 중 하나가 이 소설의 주인공,
미래의 천마 '여하륜'이라는 것을 깨닫게 되었다!

"야, 살려 준 은혜가 있으니 형이라 불러라."

목숨을 구해 준 은혜로 미래의 천마와는 의형제를 맺고,
재능을 눈여겨 본 백린의선과는 사제 지간을 맺어
강호제일신의가 되는 진천희의 일대기!

지금 시작합니다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
description.ru:
Поехал на медицинское волонтёрство, а попал на гражданскую войну. Хотел спасти пациента – получил пулю и умер. А после… стал ребенком?!
Разграбленные повозки, люди в необычных одеждах – всё это напоминает мир Мурим. Оказав первую помощь пострадавшим, после встретив спасательный отряд из «Лечебницы трёх поколений поднебесной» и самого Пэк Рин Ый Сона, я осознал, что нахожусь в мире романа про боевые искусства «Величайший небесный демон».
Один из тогда спасённых мною – главный герой книги, будущий небесный демон – Ё Ха Рюн. «Эй, за то, что спас, можешь звать меня старшим братом» – вот так мы с ним сдружились. А Пэк Рин Ый Сон, рассмотревший во мне талант, стал мне учителем.
Меня зовут Чин Чхон Хи, я - последняя надежда Канхо, и это моя история!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
description.th:
จินชอนฮี' ถูกจับพลัดจับผลูไปเป็นแพทย์อาสาอยู่ในพื้นที่ที่เกิดสงครามกลางเมือง
วันหนึ่งคนไข้ของเขาถูกฝ่ายกบฎใช้ปืนจ่อหมายเอาชีวิต
ทำให้เขาต้องเอาตัวเข้าไปขวางจนถูกยิงในที่สุด

ขณะที่กำลังปลงกับชีวิตและกำลังจะหมดลมหายใจ
จินชอนฮีก็ลืมตามาพบว่าตนเองอยู่ในร่างเด็ก
เท่านั้นยังไม่พอเขายังสวมชุดโบราณด้วย!

ลืมตามาได้ไม่เท่าไหร่เขาก็ต้องใช้วิชาที่เรียนมารักษาผู้คนที่บาดเจ็บ
และหนึ่งในนั้นก็คือจอมยุทธ์จากสำนัก 'ม้าด่วนมังกรเมฆา'
แล้วต่อมา 'แพ็คลิน' หนึ่งในหมอสามสำนักแพทย์ใหญ่ในใต้หล้า
ก็ปรากฎตัวขึ้น!

เขาจึงได้รู้ว่าตัวเองนั้นหลุดมาอยู่ในนิยายธีมยุทธภพ
เรื่อง 'จอมมารสวรรค์' ที่เขาเคยอ่านในโลกที่จากมา

ในเมื่อยังไม่รู้วิธีที่จะออกจากโลกนี้เขาจึงต้องใช้วิชาแพทย์ที่เคยร่ำเรียน
และความได้เปรียบจากการเป็นแฟนคลับตัวยงของนิยาย
เอาชีวิตรอดในโลกยุทธภพแห่งนี้!

title.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!

altTitles.ja: 陰キャの僕に罰ゲームで告白してきたはずのギャルが、どう見ても僕にベタ惚れです

altTitles.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 因懲罰遊戲才向陰角的我告白的辣妹，怎麼看都已經完全迷戀上我了

altTitles.ko: 아싸인 내게 벌칙 게임으로 고백해 온 갸루가 아무리 봐도 나한테 반한 것 같다

altTitles.ru: Девушка, которая должна была признаться мне в качестве игрового наказания, очевидно, влюбилась в меня

altTitles.pl: Introwertyczne wpadki podrywowe: Ta Gyaru zakochała się we mnie po uszy!
Gal, która miała mi wyznać miłość w ramach gry z karą, najwyraźniej się we mnie zakochała.

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya no Boku ni Batsu Game ni Kokuhaku Shitekita Hazu no Gyaru ga, Doumitemo Boku ni Betahore Desu

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

altTitles.ja: ホテル・メッツァペウラへようこそ

description.en: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.

altTitles.th: เด็กพันธุ์นรกสั่งลุย

altTitles.ja: べるぜバブ

description.en:
Ishiyama High is a school populated entirely by delinquents, where nonstop violence and lawlessness are the norm. However, there is one universally acknowledged rule—don't cross first year student Tatsumi Oga, Ishiyama's most vicious fighter.  
  
One day, Oga is by a riverbed when he encounters a man floating down the river. After being retrieved by Oga, the man splits down the middle to reveal a baby, which crawls onto Oga's back and immediately forms an attachment to him. Though he doesn't know it yet, this baby is named Kaiser de Emperana Beelzebub IV, or "Baby Beel" for short—the son of the Demon Lord!  
  
As if finding the future Lord of the Underworld isn't enough, Oga is also confronted by Hildegard, Beel's demon maid who insists he take responsibility as Beel's guardian. Together they attempt to raise Baby Beel—although surrounded by juvenile delinquents and demonic powers, the two of them may be in for more of a challenge than they can imagine.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Beelzebub** (2013)
description.ru:
Сильный хулиган Ога Тацуми, по прозвищу Лютый Ога, Демон или «Чтоб он сдох!» находит ребенка, который оказывается сыном Короля Демонов! Он избранный воспитать ребенка, пока тот не дорастет до того когда будет способен уничтожить мир, вместе с демоном-нянькой Хильдой. Они точно уморят мир …смехом!  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11858) (anime)
description.uk:
У школі "Ішіяма" панує хаос серед учнів-правопорушників, у коридорах панують насильство та беззаконня. Але серед цього безладу одне правило стоїть понад усе: ніколи не переходити дорогу першокурснику Тацумі Озі, найзапеклішому бійцю школи.
Одного доленосного дня Ога натрапляє на таємничого чоловіка, що пливе річкою. На його подив, чоловік розкривається, відкриваючи немовля, яке одразу ж чіпляється до Оги. Він не знає, що це немовля - Кайзер Де Імперана Вельзевул IV, спадкоємець Повелителя Демонів, також відомий як "Малюк Вельзик".
Вимушено взявши на себе роль опікуна, Ога опиняється у світі демонічних сил і підліткової злочинності. З появою Хільдегарди, демонічної покоївки Вельзика, Ога мусить долати труднощі виховання Вельзика, водночас борючись за власну репутацію найсильнішого в Ішіямі.
Коли Ога та Вельзевул разом проходять через випробування шкільного життя, вони дізнаються, що справжнім випробуванням є їхній неймовірний зв'язок на тлі хаосу та надприродних сил.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Suru Gawa no Monogatari - Nakama wo Tsuihou Shitara Party ga Jakutaika Shitakedo, Sekaiichi wo Mezashimasu.

description.en:
"Exile" and you're weakened!? A "do-over" fantasy of a failed party!
"Stardust", an up-and-coming party, in order to aim even higher, expels Est, a “burden” of the party members.
But as a result, the party is weakened and Est is awakened!

In this "Serves You Right!" situation, a swordsman with zero motivation and zero pride rises to the occasion!
This is a story about the "Aftermath" of the "Side that Banished Him".

altTitles.ja: はめつのおうこく

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

title.en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake

description.en: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

description.en: After an awkward encounter on her vacation, Wei Lan swapped bodies with a boy named Bai Yuan! Is this heaven's plan, or a trick of fate? Their strings of destiny follow the drifting star in the water.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.en: Diary of our Days at the Breakwater

altTitles.ja: 放課後ていぼう日誌

description.en:
Hina Tsurugi and her family have just moved to a quaint seaside town. Hoping to savor the sight of the peaceful ocean, Hina stumbles upon a girl named Yuuki Kuroiwa - an upperclassman at her new school - who invites Hina to join her in fishing. Hina reels in an octopus, which falls onto her; being afraid of bugs and big creatures, she panics and begs Yuuki to remove it from her. Yuuki sees this as an opportunity to force Hina to join the school's Breakwater Club - a club where members gather, catch, and eat various types of marine life as their main activity.  
Although her attempts to refuse to join fail, Hina slowly begins to discover the hidden joy in fishing. Her view on the sport changes, now looking forward to all the delightful experiences she can take part in alongside her fellow club members. Surrounded by eccentric club members, how will Hina’s high school life turn out?
description.ru: Главная героиня, старшеклассница Хина Цуруги, проживает в небольшом приморском городке, ходит в школу и предпочитает спокойное времяпрепровождение дома активному отдыху на природе. Поэтому она очень удивилась, когда, выбравшись на прогулку, встретила на набережной знакомую ученицу, Юки Куроиву, с энтузиазмом предложившую ей вступить в клуб «Тэйбо» и заняться рыбалкой! К собственному изумлению, Хина согласилась! Как будет развиваться её школьная жизнь теперь, когда она находится в окружении весёлых и эксцентричных членов клуба?

title.en: You've Got the Wrong House, Villain

altTitles.en: You Have Got the Wrong House, Villain
You've Come to the Wrong House, Villain

altTitles.fr: Tu es arrivé à la maison fautive, méchant

altTitles.ar: لقد حصلت على المنزل الخطأ أيها الشرير

altTitles.es-la: Villano, estás en la casa equivocada

description.en:
As if it weren't enough for me to be reincarnated as a child in the slums, I was taken to a city of crime and became a test subject. But then, when I saw the man that came to destroy the research institute, I realized that this place was the world of *Piper*, a reverse harem novel. While living a relatively normal life after escaping from the institute, the heroine of the novel moved in next door. From the looks of it, I might be the heroine's neighbor, an extra. Originally, the heroine was to save the unconscious and fatally wounded villain and in return, be subject to a fanatical obsession. But, why. Why is the sub-villain collapsed in front of my house? The sub-villain, Lakis Avalon, was the king of the underworld and the very same frightening man that I had met at the institute before. I took a moment’'s glance around then I kicked the man’s body away.

Hey, you're got the wrong house, villain.

title.en: The Female Supporting Character Doesn't Want the Protagonist to Break Up [Novel Transmigration]

altTitles.zh: 女配不想让主角分手[穿书]
Nv Pei Buxiang Rang Zhujiao Fenshou [Chuan Shu]

description.en: Shen Wanqing was reborn as a vicious female supporting role in a fantasy romance novel. She thought her mission was to break up the hero and heroine and capture the hero, but she didn't expect the system to say: First, turn this novel into a sweet one. Second, stop the villain in the book and save the world. Shen Wanqing had no choice but to assist the hero and heroine while planning to kill the villain. Unexpectedly, the villain became more and more ambiguous with her. Shen Wanqing felt that this was not going in the right direction...

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital

altTitles.ru: Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

description.en: Exhausted mentally and physically, Song Liaoliao is ready to leave it all behind. She couldn't have anticipated that the new director is her old sweet- no, her old classmate. It should simply be a reunion of old friends, but Song Liaoliao unexpectedly finds herself gradually falling into Pei Yu's love trap...
description.zh: 甲方折磨到身心俱疲的宋了了只想就地出家，不想空降领导竟是她的老情——啊不，老同学。 原本只是旧友重逢，宋了了却怎么都没想到，自己竟一步一步陷入裴妤的爱情陷阱……

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: ワンサイドインルーム

description.en:
[I'm afraid of falling in love too much.]

The most popular guy in college x the shy and frustrating campus life of a Buddha-faced man! -- Oka, a college student with bad eyes and who is kept away from others, is in love with Saeki, a good-looking guy from the same university. Shortly after entering the school, Saeki kissed him and said, ``You're cute,'' as a new member of the club, and he suddenly approached him. After that, they were completely absorbed in the house, and they ended up doing more than just kissing. Oka thinks that Saeki is interested in him on a whim, but contrary to his seemingly relaxed attitude, Saeki is also becoming serious about Oka.

altTitles.ja: 劇場版モノノ怪 唐傘

description.en: Asa and Kame meet on their first day of serving in the Ooku - and quickly discover that things there are more complicated than they imagined. A strange cult, an unexplained delay in a palace festival, and even samurai in the Ooku are just some of the oddities they encounter. And what does the Medicine Seller, who peddles love potions and mononoke exorcisms, have to do with any of this...?

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

title.en: I Scared the Divine Lord as I Handed Over the Ancient Immortal Pill

altTitles.zh-ro: Kaiju Shang Jiao Taigu Xian Yao, Wo Xia Huai Sheng Zhu

altTitles.zh: 开局上交太古仙药，我吓坏圣主

altTitles.id: Aku menakuti sang dewa agung dengan menyerahkan ramuan surgawi kuno

description.en: Bai Yifan has an ancient ring that allows him to travel freely between the Earth and the fantasy world, and he has discovered that "plants and animals" on the Earth will evolve into treasures when they are taken to the fantasy world. An apple evolves into an immortal fruit, an egg will hatch into a phoenix or an earth dog has the bloodline of a dragon. One could even use tobacco to manipulate the enemy to their advantage.
description.id: Bai Yifan memiliki cincin kuno yang memungkinkannya untuk melakukan perjalanan dengan bebas antara Bumi dan dunia fantasi, dan dia telah menemukan fakta bahwa "tanaman dan hewan" di Bumi akan berevolusi menjadi harta karun ketika dibawa ke dunia fantasi. Sebuah apel berevolusi menjadi buah abadi, sebuah telur akan menetas menjadi burung phoenix atau seekor serigala bumi yang memiliki garis keturunan naga. Mereka bahkan dapat menggunakan tembakau untuk memanipulasi musuhnya.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en:
Our main character, who is exhausted from being a corporate slave, gets transported to another world and lives as a pet of Heteromorphic head-san.
They both have romantic feelings for each other, however, because of their racial differences, they can’t seem to progress, but…
description.ja: 現世で社畜ＯＬとして疲れ果てた主人公が異世界転移して、異形頭さんのペットとして暮らすことに。互いに恋愛感情があるものの種族の壁から中々発展しないが…
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: All My Abilities Are Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Quanmin Zhuan Zhi Wode Jineng Quan Shi Jin Zhou Qianyue

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我的技能全是禁咒 签约

altTitles.en: Job Transfer For All: My Skills Are All Forbidden Spells

description.en:
Lin Han finds himself transmigrated into a world that merges reality and games. This world is rife with dungeons, forbidden zones, and hidden realms, not to mention rampaging monsters! 

When the time for the Class Change comes, Lin Han doesn’t receive the Warrior Class that he has always dreamt of. 

Instead, he receives the class Life Cleric. Just as he’s despairing over his misfortune…

[Ding! You’ve awakened the “Myriad Augmentation System”!] 

With every attribute augmented ten thousand times, all of Lin Han’s basic skills have turned into Forbidden Spells! 

Watch Lin Han as he dominates the battlefield with his Forbidden Spells and becomes known as a close-combat Healer!
- - -
Crossing to the other world with his soul, Lin Han arrived in an era where games and reality merged. There are countless dungeons, forbidden lands, and hidden realms where mighty monsters reign supreme!

On the day of his class profession, Lin Han missed the opportunity to become a warrior, the class of his dreams! Unexpectedly, he awakened the unique hidden profession – Life Sacrificer – at a critical moment!

[Ding! Ten Thousandfold Amplification System Awakening!]

Lin Han’s attributes increased by ten thousand times, and his basic skills all reached forbidden curses!

In the name of a close-combat healer, during the moment of unlimited forbidden curse devastation!

altTitles.en: Possibly the Greatest Alchemist of All Time

altTitles.ja: いずれ最強の錬金術師?

altTitles.en: Someday Will I Be the Greatest Alchemist?

description.en:
Not even a hero, Takumi Iruma gets accidentally mixed in with a group of heroes chosen to be summoned to another world. As compensation for the mix-up, a goddess offers him the right to choose any skill he wishes for! Hoping for a peaceful and quiet life that has nothing to do with fighting or going into battle, he chooses a seemingly boring creation skill. However, it turns out "alchemy" is the most powerful skill that allows him to create everything from a holy sword to flying ships! This cheat skill he unexpectedly acquired turns him into a wealthy merchant and makes him undefeatable in battles! A heartwarming adventure story about (possibly) the most powerful alchemist in another world!

*Alpha Manga*

---

*Alternate description:*

Iruma Takumi, a 40-year old salary man, was dragged into a hero summoning just like in a template. What was his fate? The Goddess sent him and the heroes to the other world separately.  
  
With the Goddess’ overprotective support, he landed in a different world looking handsome, rejuvenated, and quite different from a Japanese.  
  
Although he wanted a slow life while working in the manufacturing trade, that was not permitted by the Goddess’ special body and abilities.  
  
Would Takumi be able to live a peaceful life in a different world?

altTitles.ja: となりの百怪見聞録

description.en: Something happens to Katagiri Jinpachi late one night when he unwittingly wanders into the youkai market. The only one who knows what it was seems to be one Harada Oriza, a famed painter of youkai portraits. But he is not talking, and Jinpachi only grows more frustrated and confused as he tries to return to the market and find out what he lost... or gained there.

altTitles.ja: ボクの旦那様

description.en: A love story between a young cat and a protective dog.

title.en: The Reason I Have to Be a Villain

altTitles.en: The Reason I Have to Be a Villainess

description.en: After being reborn in a novel, Renee Blair is determined to transform her reputation as "the villainess of the century," which will prevent her death at the hands of Sir Dywen the dragon slayer! But then she learns that the original Renee had been controlled by a pop-up game system of daily missions that forced her to either commit evil deeds or face painful penalties for declining. With this system continuing to affect her as well, can the new Renee outsmart the game and reset her evil legacy?

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: 推しの下僕になりまして

description.en: The protagonist, grieving the death of her favorite character, finds herself reincarnated into the game's world before her beloved's demise! As the mob character Lou Lurea, she resolves to save her favorite character no matter what. However, she is reincarnated into a magical academy filled with handsome vampires. As the only human, Lou is nothing more than a delicious treat to everyone. While being pursued as "prey" by the characters, she struggles to prevent her favorite's bad ending...?! A story begins where love for her favorite character changes destiny!

altTitles.ja: ほんのり!どんぱっち

description.en: Following a similar narrative to its predecessor (Fuwari! Donpatch), Honnori! Donpatch is a slice of life involving Beauty living with Donpatch. Here, however, it is not a parody, but more a pastiche of Kiyohiko Azuma's beloved slice of life series Yostuba&!
description.ja: 不思議な生物・首領パッチと暮らすビュティ。二人は河原を散歩したり、友達とカラオケしたり、たまに喧嘩もするけど、ほんのりとした日常を過ごしています。だけど首領パッチの知り合いという破天荒が現れて!?

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.es-la: Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en: He got a doomsday salvation system. As long as he saves the world, he can have everything. He recruited top talents to build the Pan-Human Principle Guardian Association. He descended into the doomsday worlds as the guardian of human principles, allowing the whole world to admire him and worship him as a god. The ultimate natural disaster. The mutation frenzy. The whisper of the evil god. Thus, a huge organization spanning many worlds, taking the protection of human principles as its own responsibility and saving civilization from the fate of destruction, gradually appeared in the eyes of the world.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

altTitles.zh-ro: Lang Xiaojie He Ta De Huli Meimei

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...
This is a story about a prodigal son who, while squandering his money in various ways, beats up a group of destined men.

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

altTitles.en: Magic Beast Sword Saint ('s Otherworldly Adventure)
Swordmaster of Warcraft: Invasion of the Otherworld

altTitles.es-la: Asesino de bestias magicas de otro mundo

description.en: An online game addict Liu Feng got transferred into a world of magic and swords by accident. As he can neither use magic nor douqi, people looked down on him. Originally thinking he'll be able to cheat his way to his life's peak with the sword saint occupation, he was scolded by the natives so badly he questioned life. Can he really continue surviving in this land where danger is everywhere and become someone who's strong enough to control the fate of his life?
description.pt-br: O garoto viciado em Internet Liu Feng acidentalmente cruzou o mundo da espada e da magia. Ele não pode usar magia e não tem vingança. Ele foi ridicularizado como um “artista marcial demoníaco”. Ele pensava que se despertasse no jogo as habilidades da profissão de espadachim, poderia trapacear no auge da vida, mas desconfiava da vida dos indígenas locais. Em um continente cheio de crises, ele pode realmente sobreviver e se tornar um homem forte que controla seu próprio destino?

title.en: My Trainee Teacher Is Actually a Goth Rocker

altTitles.vi: Cô giáo thực tập của tôi thực ra là 1 Goth Rocker
